title: Sakura Trick
description: The story revolves around Haruka and Yuu, two girls who go to a high school that is slated to be shut down in three years. To share something special between them, they share a kiss, and their relationship deepens from that moment onward.
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Shoujo Ai>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
